QuestData.Title: Sarathstra, Scourge of the North
QuestData.Description: Me hunters be dead or frozen, $n. You still want to do dis? Just say da word and me call for da dragon once more.$B$BIf ya kill it, take da beast's frozen heart back to Agmar's Hammer and present it to Gort. He sure to reward you good, mon.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Rokhan to call down the frostwyrm, Sarathstra.$B$BKill Sarathstra and deliver Sarathstra's Frozen Heart to Captain Gort at Agmar's Hammer.
QuestData.RewardText: HA! You did it! The soldiers at the Wrathgate are indebted to you, $n! This'll surely buy a few of them another day above ground.
